title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 31 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 31 2021
description:
EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, "The Czar of Talk" from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, closed out the final 2021 hours of Broadcast Excellence with reflections on how to achieve the best for you in '22. On this end-of-year Open Line Friday, we opened up the phone lines to what continues to be the greatest audience in all of media. Mentors are important. Unions are the top Democratic special interest group. Kamala is not the answer. Joe throws up his hands on covid, Bidenflation. Believe it or not, leftists target The Gipper's statue at his namesake Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport. But you don't tear down the man who said, "Tear down this wall." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
